thread.title: The sports world's best 'Back to the Future' moments
thread.title_full: The sports world's best 'Back to the Future' moments

author: Cheryl Wray | cwray@al.com
title: The sports world's best 'Back to the Future' moments
text:
Sports teams and athletes celebrated the unofficial Back to the Future Day with exuberance on Oct. 21, 2015 (the day that Marty McFly and Doc Brown traveled to the future in the "Back to the Future 2" movie). 
Here are some of the best celebratory tweets we saw today from the sports world: Hoverboards are NOT allowed inside the arena. If hovering to today's game, use your thumbprint to check it in at the door. #BackToTheFuture ‚Äî Atlanta Hawks (@ATLHawks) October 21, 2015 Who wants to go see Jaws 19 with me? #McFly #GoCubbies pic.twitter.com/CNQUfsQYJT ‚Äî Julian Edelman (@Edelman11) October 21, 2015 It's #BackToTheFuture Day! Remember that time Fredbird did some time traveling? https://t.co/QF5J925lMv pic.twitter.com/q1bnOstKDs ‚Äî St. Louis Cardinals (@Cardinals) October 21, 2015 Great Scott ! It's #BackToTheFuture Day ! Nom de Zeus ! C'est le jour de #RetourVersLeFutur ! üé•‚ö°Ô∏èüé¨ @BacktotheFuture pic.twitter.com/0vSYzHOEwz
